channel.title: Help with Pi!
channel.description: Yeh i im using Pi Tyreattascape base and the problem is that the dragon claws special attack hits only 2 hit and 2 0s..... how i can fix that all 4 hit hits something? :)

item.title: Help with Pi!
item.dc:creator: @horses2007 horses2007
item.description:
@horses2007 wrote:

I am not very good with special attacks personally, but i will try to help.

Go to Combatassistant.java
search for:

Replace that whole thing with this (including the case 14484:)

case 14484: c.gfx0(1950); c.startAnimation(10961); c.specAccuracy = 9.5; c.clawDamage = 0; c.specDamage = 1.17;

Note, this may have been the problem, or may not have, but like i said im not very familiar with this.

Read full topic
